name: Shanghai Shopping Tour
description:
Shanghai has been famed as "the Shopping Paradise" and "the Oriental Paris' in history. Many poular shopping centers, department stores, hundred year old shops, shops for special commodities ,tailor-made markets .The difficulty is knowing where to go, how to get around and what price you should be paying, especially when you are foreigners.
SFS takes the hassle out of your shopping experience.We offer personalized shopping tour service for specific shopping needs in Shanghai. Our Local experienced shopping guides or personal shoppers will bring you the best local places to shop and you will feel like shopping as local.
